mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS idx, a.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT country FROM beer WHERE country Like ('%'|| #{keyword} ||'%') ORDER BY country) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{idx} + 20) WHERE idx > #{idx}
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM beer ORDER BY type

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.beerNo, beerName, beerPic, company, country, type, abv, b.rating, ratingBA, note, (SELECT count(*) FROM REVIEW r WHERE b.beerNo = r.beerNo) rcnt FROM beer b LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON b.beerNo = r.beerNo ORDER BY rcnt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM beer ORDER BY ratingcnt) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO beer_like (bLikeNo, uuid, beerNo, regDate) VALUES(seq_bLike_no.nextVal, #{uuid}, #{beerNo}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM beer_like WHERE beerNo = #{beerNo} AND uuid = #{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT b.beerNo, beerName, beerPic, company, country, type, abv, rating, ratingBA, note FROM beer b JOIN beer_like bl ON b.beerNo = bl.beerNo WHERE bl.uuid = #{uuid} ORDER BY regdate DESC
